snippet: The MDX still has Acura’s Super Handling All-Wheel Drive, but Sun Belt customers can save money on the third generation model by opting for front-wheel drive.
abstract: The MDX still has Acura’s Super Handling All-Wheel Drive, but Sun Belt customers can save money on the third generation model by opting for front-wheel drive.

headline.main: Video: Acura Combines Good Handling and Crossover Utility in the MDX
